A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All in all a good movie but it definitely had some unnecessary corny parts. It does seem like many scenes didn't exactly move the narrative along\, but at the same time I don't think it necessarily made those scenes overly flat. Of course\, many of you would suggest my opinion doesn't count because I didn't dismiss the prequels immediately either. When people get overly fond of something\, they often forget the origins\, and this film sits nicely with the 'ole Star Wars feel.
